meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Ella Rich Noel Steere Sage Andersen Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #4052.

td.p: Ella Rich, a freelance translator originally from Springfield, Missouri
Noel Steere, a systems analyst from Chicago, Illinois
Sage Andersen, a student from Oakland, California (whose 2-day cash winnings total $27,600)

tr.td: STATE BIRDS
COMEDIANS
OLD GLORY
NOTABLE NAMES
D.C. ABBR.
"B" YOUR BEST

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
